detaileddescription.para: Section: Visualization Toolkit Geo Vis Classes

sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: vtkGeoAlignedImageSource uses a high resolution image to generate tiles at multiple resolutions in a hierarchy. It should be used as a source in vtkGeoAlignedImageRepresentation.
To create an instance of class vtkGeoAlignedImageSource, simply invoke its constructor as follows obj = vtkGeoAlignedImageSource

sect1.title: Methods
sect1.para:
The class vtkGeoAlignedImageSource has several methods that can be used. They are listed below. Note that the documentation is translated automatically from the VTK sources, and may not be completely intelligible. When in doubt, consult the VTK website. In the methods listed below, obj is an instance of the vtkGeoAlignedImageSource class.
